page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN SABDEN
page.content: The majority of working people in Sabden commute to towns and cities outside the village.Many work in Blackburn,Accrington and Burnley,particularly in the Ribble Cement works in Clitheroe.During a survey taken by our group it was found that out of{100}people interviewed,{ {60%}have worked in the village and{34% worked outside the village.The time of the survey being between{9.30am.}and { {3.15pm.}could bias the results as those who work outside the vilage could not be interviewed.Most of the villagers who are employed in Sabden work at the furniture factory "Pendle Furniture".The villagers also work in various other occupations including farming;printing;toolmaking;paper tube manufacture and assorted cottage industries. ANTONY MUSKER MATTHEW GORTON.
